name: Potential
description:
Disclaimer: Yes this is related to Spring because this game is about METAL Springs, not the Season. Ah, see? 

Welcome To Potential, A building puzzle game where you have to lead a Robot to the other side of the screen!

Controls:

Click the Forward button to Start the Robot. The Robot can  only go forward, and if it hits into something, its fails.

Click The Spring box to drop a spring. Grab and Move the spring and drop it above the ground to make a path for the Robot. 

Use the trash can to dispose of objects 

Use the Side Scroll Remote to Move the camera.

Once you see it, press the battery box to drop a floating battery for the Robot to touch it (It speeds up the bot and makes it jump higher for a second).

There are 15 levels to complete.

Notes:

Created for Great Spring Game Jam 2021. If you end up losing a spring by a glitch, just press go and  the supply of springs will go back to normal. You can't drop a spring if the box is touching platforms.
